text:
@Bug12June @ChrisBEsq @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Wait. He showed Fox News clips of CNN and MSNBC downplaying the virus? Weird.

How is it he "did nothing" when he was called a racist for restricting travel from China?  Even Fauci, who the left seems to love, was saying it wasn't a threat to Americans, even after the ban. https://t.co/67hXiCWdOO
